content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

The Accu-Beam® Endoscope Camera Adapter connects cameras that have an endoscope coupler to most Surgical Microscopes and Ophthalmic Slit Lamps.

  • Connects directly to an endoscope coupler clamp
  • Interchangeable lenses for the right magnification on any camera and endoscope
  • Focus-control to fine tune your image
  • X/Y adjustment to center your view
  • Adjustable iris to regulate incoming light
  • Can mount to any Zeiss-style beamsplitter exit port

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72103,72102″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1569886661571{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Endoscope Camera Adapter

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Designed to interface with endoscopic cameras, the Endoscope Camera Adapter is able to connect directly to an endoscope coupler or clamp. For cameras that have a removable coupler this adapter saves valuable time when moving the camera to a microscope. For cameras that have a permanently affixed coupler, this adapter allows them to connect to a microscope when it was previously impossible.

The relay lens on this adapter can easily be removed, allowing the operator to connect any C-mount camera to the included mount below.

Part # 2010TTI

U.S. Patent No. 5,264,92

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54ee9c-cc8e”][vc_column_text]

Compatible with Zeiss, Alcon, Leica/WILD, Moller-Wedel/Haag Streit, Topcon, Vasconcellos, Marco, Reichert, Shin Nippon, Takagi, Nidek, CSO, Appasamy, Burton, Woodlyn, KAPS, Seiler, Global and other manufacturers.

A Beamsplitter or Beamsplitter Adapter may be required.

Haag-Streit Disclaimer

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dee9c-cc8e”][vc_column_text]

The Endoscope Camera Adapter is a class 1 device, and is approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014aee9c-cc8e”][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
